title: Large 2 story house for urgent sale
details:
Large 2 story house for urgent sale in Wellampitiya.
800m to Avissawella Rd. 3.5km to Kandy Road and Katunayake Express way entrance.
Ground Floor - Large hall and dining room, 5 beds, 2 baths, 2 kitchens, laundry room
1st Floor - 2 beds, 1 bath, 1 kitchen
Parking available for 4 vehicles

21,000,000/= Price is negotiable only after inspection.
